name: Renegade (itch) (Zack Bazzle)
description:
In this endless runner play as Atticus who has an extremely deadly ability that he has no control over. Grab the blue orbs to neutralize his ability before he kills himself. (Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49)

Use A & D to move left to right. Use Spacebar to jump, time your jumps at the right time to vault over objects.
